parametrized_description: You are designing an office space with NumDeskTypes different desk types. Each desk type has a Price, Space, and Seats. The total cost of the desks must not exceed MaxBudget, and the total space occupied by the desks must not exceed MaxSpace. The goal is to determine the number of each desk type to maximize the total seating availability.

Space.description: Space occupied by each desk type

Seats.description: Seating capacity of each desk type

NumDesks.description: The number of desks of each type

constraints.description: The total cost of the desks must not exceed MaxBudget.

code.gurobipy: model.addConstr(quicksum(Price[i] * NumDesks[i] for i in range(NumDeskTypes)) <= MaxBudget)

constraints.description: The total space occupied by the desks must not exceed MaxSpace.

code.gurobipy: model.addConstr(quicksum(Space[i] * NumDesks[i] for i in range(NumDeskTypes)) <= MaxSpace)

objective.description: The total seating availability is the sum of the seating capacity of each desk type multiplied by the number of that desk type. The objective is to maximize the total seating availability.

code.gurobipy: model.setObjective(quicksum(Seats[i] * NumDesks[i] for i in range(NumDeskTypes)), GRB.MAXIMIZE)
